title: Kalaupapa National Historical Park: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved        Volunteers remove invasive vegetation at Papaloa Cemetery at Kalaupapa. NPS photo / C. Mardorf   Â    Looking for how to get involved? Browse through the website navigation or use the search tool to find opportunities.    NPS Centennial The National Park Service turns 100 on August 25, 2016. Find out what we're doing to get ready, and look for ways that you can help!   Donate Find out how you can make a financial donation. Donations enhance programs and activities that protect park resources. We welcome and are grateful for your support!   Work with Us Keep an eye out for year-round or summer seasonal employment at Kalaupapa. Find out more about volunteer opportunities.    Planning The planning process is how the public can express opinions in the management of a national park. Find out if any current opportunities exist to share your voice, or browse past planning documents.   Sustainability Learn what we're doing to minimize our impact on the environment, and find suggestions of how you can help.
